title: Reaction to firing of NFL coaches & previewing AFC matchups on Wild Card Weekend
itunes:title: Reaction to firing of NFL coaches & previewing AFC matchups on Wild Card Weekend
description:
Bucky Brooks is joined by NFL Media's Lance Zierlein on this new episode. First, the guys talk about the recent firings of NFL coaches and name potential replacements (1:06). Then the pair, preview the Wild Card Weekend by diving specifically into the AFC matchups on Saturday (32:22). To wrap up the show, Lance and Bucky preview the College Football Playoff National Championship Game and evaluate the players within it, including LSU QB Joe Burrow (44:42).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
